mainBoard.flavorText: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.
mainBoard.name: Air Elemental
mainBoard.text: Flying

mainBoard.flavorText: Little dreamt could seem so cruel As waiting for the wings outspread, The jagged teeth, the burning eyes, And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.
mainBoard.name: Azure Drake
mainBoard.text: Flying

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!"
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician
mainBoard.name: Blinking Spirit
mainBoard.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report
mainBoard.name: Disruptive Student
mainBoard.text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor
mainBoard.name: Infantry Veteran

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher
mainBoard.name: Man-o'-War

rulings.text: If there are no other creatures on the battlefield when Man-o’-War enters the battlefield, its ability must target itself.

mainBoard.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.name: Manta Riders
mainBoard.text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.
mainBoard.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mainBoard.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.
mainBoard.name: Songstitcher
mainBoard.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.

mainBoard.flavorText:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching
mainBoard.name: Soul Warden

rulings.text: Does not trigger on a card on the battlefield being changed into a creature.
The ability will not trigger on itself entering the battlefield, but it will trigger on any other creature that is put onto the battlefield at the same time.
Two Soul Wardens entering the battlefield at the same time will each cause the other’s ability to trigger.

mainBoard.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
—William Blake,
*The Marriage of Heaven and Hell*
mainBoard.name: Wind Drake
mainBoard.text: Flying

mainBoard.name: Wrath of God
mainBoard.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
—Barrin, master wizard
mainBoard.name: Windfall
mainBoard.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

mainBoard.name: Counterspell
mainBoard.text: Counter target spell.

mainBoard.name: Curfew
mainBoard.text: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic
mainBoard.name: Disenchant

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.name: Healing Salve
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath
mainBoard.name: Mana Leak
mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer."
—Barrin, master wizard
mainBoard.name: Opportunity
mainBoard.text: Target player draws four cards.

mainBoard.name: Ray of Command

rulings.text: You may target an untapped creature with Ray of Command.

The creature returns to the opponent when the “until end of turn” effect wears off during the cleanup step. It taps during the Cleanup step (if it is not already tapped), so any abilities triggered off it tapping happen at that time.
You tap the creature when you lose control of it for any reason — because Ray of Command’s effect ends, or because a spell or ability causes another player to gain control of it.

mainBoard.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

mainBoard.name: Swords to Plowshares

rulings.text: The amount of life gained is equal to the power of the targeted creature as it last existed on the battlefield.
If the creature's power is negative, its controller doesn't lose or gain life.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

mainBoard.name: Control Magic

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, *Witches and War*
mainBoard.name: Flood
mainBoard.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

mainBoard.name: Remote Isle

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

mainBoard.text:
Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainBoard.name: Thalakos Lowlands
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.
